markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1956) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58)

**Prerequisites**
trained in light armor and simple weapons

</column>

---

You are always ready to draw your weapon and begin a duel, no matter the circumstances. You gain the [Quick Draw](/Feats.aspx?ID=498) ranger feat, enabling you to both draw and attack with a weapon as 1 action. This serves as Quick Draw for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the duelist archetype.

<title level="2">Duelist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Duelist's Challenge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1957), [Selfless Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=1958), [Student of the Dueling Arts](/Feats.aspx?ID=1959), [Tut-Tut](/Feats.aspx?ID=4136), [Watch This!](/Feats.aspx?ID=4140)
name: Duelist Dedication
prerequisite: trained in light armor and simple weapons
prerequisite_markdown: trained in light armor and simple weapons
